Updated to leverage the "role" attribute in a schematron rule in determining the severity level of a failed-assert message in the schematron report.
Added in the 1101 version of the schema and schematron and set as default for this release.

release.description: This release of the Core Library is a component of the integrated release 3.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added in the 0310b version of the schema and schematron and set as default for this release.

Added a file reference validator that performs the following checks: Validate that the casing specified in the label matches the casing on the file system and validate that the generated checksums match the checksums specified in the label, if provided.
Added a DocumentValidator class that provides an extension point to the library to perform validation on parsed PDS4 labels.
Bundled in DTD for 1.1 catalog. This allows doctypes to be specified in catalog files.
